title: Healthified Mushroom Risotto - KA Daily
html: Healthified Mushroom Risotto
description: This dish is perfect for when you want a big bowl of comfort food without feeling too heavy and full afterward! And the best part - it's only one pan! SERVING SIZE: 42 cups mushrooms, diced1.5 cups onion, diced'2 cups kale, stemmed & finely chopped3-4 cloves garlic, minced2 cups chicken broth / veggie broth1 bag RightRice (original flavor) 2 tbsp heavy cream2 tbsp butter1/2 cup parmasean Seasonings: Vageta, salt and pepper to tasteThe recipe:Prep your veggies by dicing your mushrooms & onions and stemming your kale and finely chopping. Mince your garlic cloves. In a skillet on medium heat, saute your mushrooms and onion for about 4-5 minutes, then add in your kale, garlic and vageta. Saute until the kale has wilted (appx. 2-3 minutes).Then add in your broth and RightRice. Mix, then simmer on low heat for about 10 minutes. Add in a touch of cream, butter and your parmesan. Combine thoroughly and enjoy!! Feel free to top it with even more parm!! xx
